vlive.korean: 그 손을 여기 손에 올리면 돼, 알겠지? You just need to put your paw here. Okay? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영민이의 '몰래라이브 #1'
vlive.english: You just need to put your paw here. Okay?

vlive.korean: 그 손 뭐예요? 형 네일 한 거 괜찮아요? - 네일 했어요? What's the hand? How's your nail? - Did you get your nail done? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 눈 덩어리💚
vlive.english: What's the hand? How's your nail? - Did you get your nail done?

vlive.korean: 먹방 할 때 그 손 아니에요? Isn't that what people do on YouTube? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SF9] 힘든 하루를 위로해주는 여기는 큰집라이ㅂ.. 아니 빈,us입니다! (SF9 talking about Chani’s text message)
vlive.english: Isn't that what people do on YouTube?

vlive.korean: 그런데 화면을 주시하고 있는데 그 손은 라면을 어떻게 찾는 거죠? If you look at the monitor, how do we know where the ramen is? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.19 논리나잇 #1 (Debate Night #1)
vlive.english: If you look at the monitor, how do we know where the ramen is?

vlive.korean: 그 손 이렇게 되는 거 있죠? - 일출이 지는 거죠? Do you know the hand statue? - The sunup is when the sun is setting, right? 듣기 View video CIX : 서기의 퇴근전 라이브
vlive.english: Do you know the hand statue? - The sunup is when the sun is setting, right?

examples.korean: He held out his free hand and I took it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 아무것도 들지[잡지] 않은 손을 내게 내밀었고 내가 그 손을 잡았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He held out his free hand and I took it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The same hand that makes the sign of the cross, sharpens the knife. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 성호를 그은 바로 그 손이 칼을 간다. (러시아속담, 지혜속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: The same hand that makes the sign of the cross, sharpens the knife. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: blow[throw] a kiss to a person 듣기 Add to Wordbook (자기 손에 키스를 한 뒤 그 손을 흔들어) 남에게 키스를 보내다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
